hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Wallet# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.
